/wiki/3x3_basketball_at_the_2007_Asian_I: 3 on 3 basketball was a demonstration sport at the 2007 Asian Indoor Games was held in Macau , China on 3 November 2007 . The competition was the first major test of FIBA 3x3 , a formalized version of the basketball variant developed earlier that year by the sport 's international governing body , FIBA
/wiki/Aerobic_gymnastics_at_the_2007_Asi: Aerobic gymnastics at the 2007 Asian Indoor Games was held in Workers Sports Pavilion , Macau , China from 26 October to 28 October 2007
/wiki/Chess_at_the_2007_Asian_Indoor_Gam: Chess at the 2007 Asian Indoor Games was held in Macau International Shooting Range , Macau , China from 26 October to 3 November 2007
/wiki/Bowling_at_the_2007_Asian_Indoor_G: Bowling at the 2007 Asian Indoor Games was held in Bowling Centre , Macau , China from 27 October to 2 November 2007
/wiki/Cue_sports_at_the_2007_Asian_Indoo: Cue sports at the 2007 Asian Indoor Games was held in Macau East Asian Games Dome , Macau , China from 27 October to 2 November 2007
/wiki/Esports_at_the_2007_Asian_Indoor_G: Esports at the 2007 Asian Indoor Games was held in Macau East Asian Games Dome , Macau , China from 27 October to 30 October 2007 . Three events FIFA 07 , NBA Live 07 and Need for Speed : Most Wanted were held in the competition
/wiki/Extreme_sports_at_the_2007_Asian_I: Extreme sports at the 2007 Asian Indoor Games was held in MUST Pavilion , Macau , China from 26 October to 2 November 2007
/wiki/Finswimming_at_the_2007_Asian_Indo: Finswimming at the 2007 Asian Indoor Games was held in Macau Olympic Aquatic Centre , Macau , China from 27 October to 28 October 2007 . The competition included only surface events
/wiki/Futsal_at_the_2007_Asian_Indoor_Ga: Futsal at the 2007 Asian Indoor Games was held in Macau , China from 26 October to 3 November 2007
/wiki/Indoor_athletics_at_the_2007_Asian: Indoor athletics at the 2007 Asian Indoor Games was held in Macau East Asian Games Dome , Macau , China from 30 October to 1 November 2007
/wiki/Indoor_hockey_at_the_2007_Asian_In: Indoor hockey at the 2007 Asian Indoor Games was held in Macau , China from 26 October to 3 November 2007
/wiki/Kabaddi_at_the_2007_Asian_Indoor_G: Kabaddi was contested by seven teams at the 2007 Asian Indoor Games in Macau , China from 30 October to 3 November . The competition took place at Luso-Chinesa School Pavilion . India won the gold medal after beating Pakistan in the final 35-17
/wiki/Kurash_at_the_2007_Asian_Indoor_Ga: Kurash was a demonstration sport at the 2007 Asian Indoor Games was held in IPM Multisport Pavilion , Macau , China on 2 November 2007
/wiki/Muay_Thai_at_the_2007_Asian_Indoor: Muay Thai at the 2007 Asian Indoor Games was held in Macau East Asian Games Dome , Macau , China from 29 October to 3 November 2007
/wiki/Sepak_takraw_at_the_2007_Asian_Ind: Hoop sepak takraw was contested at the 2007 Asian Indoor Games in Macau , China from October 31 to November 3 . The competition took place at the Workers Sports Pavilion
/wiki/Short_course_swimming_at_the_2007_: Short course swimming at the 2007 Asian Indoor Games was held in Macau Olympic Aquatic Centre , Macau , China from 30 October to 2 November 2007
/wiki/Sport_climbing_at_the_2007_Asian_I: Sport climbing at the 2007 Asian Indoor Games was held in MUST Pavilion , Macau , China from 30 October to 2 November 2007
